description: Table T(m,k)=m^k+k^m (with 0^0 taken to be 1) as square array read by antidiagonals.
formula: E.g.f. Sum(n,m, T(n,m)/(n! m!)) = e^(x e^y) + e^(y e^x). [From _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Oct 26 2009]
crossrefs: Columns and rows are A000012 (apart from first term), A000027, A001580, A001585, A001589, A001593 etc. Diagonals include A013499 (apart from first two terms), A051442, A051489.
Main diagonal is 2 * A000312. More diagonals: A051442, A051489, A155539.
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Jun 08 2000
